name: NSCollectionLayoutGroup
desc: A container for a set of items that lays out the items along a path.

items.name: class func horizontal(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitems: [NSCollectionLayoutItem]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of items arranged in a horizontal line.

items.name: class func horizontal(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitem: NSCollectionLayoutItem, count: Int) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of equally sized items arranged in a horizontal line up to the number specified by count.

items.name: class func vertical(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitems: [NSCollectionLayoutItem]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of items arranged in a vertical line.

items.name: class func vertical(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, subitem: NSCollectionLayoutItem, count: Int) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a group of the specified size, containing an array of equally sized items arranged in a vertical line up to the number specified by count.

items.name: class func custom(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, itemProvider: NSCollectionLayoutGroupCustomItemProvider) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a group of the specified size, with an item provider that creates a custom arrangement for those items.

items.name: var subitems: [NSCollectionLayoutItem]
items.desc: An array of the items contained in the group.

items.name: var supplementaryItems: [NSCollectionLayoutSupplementaryItem]
items.desc: An array of the supplementary items that are anchored to the group.

items.name: var interItemSpacing: NSCollectionLayoutSpacing?
items.desc: The amount of space between the items in the group.

items.name: func visualDescription() -> String
items.desc: Returns a string with an ASCII representation of the group.
